short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to remove the black bars in the Peacock player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a simple script that modifies the CSS of Peacock's player, removing the black bars that appear when pausing or hovering over the player in your browser.
